meanings.definition: To remove or cut off the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The farmer was eloining the pig to prevent breeding.
meanings.sent2: The veterinarian performed the eloining procedure on the stray cat.
meanings.sent3: After eloining the dog, it became calmer and more relaxed.
meanings.sent4: The act of eloining is a necessary step in controlling the pet population.
meanings.sent5: The eloining process ensures responsible pet ownership.

meanings.definition: To remove or cut off the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: She eloining her pet rabbit to avoid unwanted litters.
meanings.sent2: The shelter eloining all animals before adoption.
meanings.sent3: The eloining of the horse was done with care and precision.
meanings.sent4: Eloining is a common practice in animal welfare.
meanings.sent5: The eloining surgery went smoothly without any complications.

meanings.definition: To remove or cut off the reproductive organs of an animal.
meanings.sent1: The zoo eloining some of the wild animals for population control.
meanings.sent2: Eloining is a humane way to manage animal populations.
meanings.sent3: The eloining of the sheep was done by the experienced vet.
meanings.sent4: The concept of eloining has been practiced for centuries.
meanings.sent5: Proper eloining helps in maintaining a healthy animal community.
